docs.lead_paragraph: SOMEWHERE in that most fascinating of literary autobiographies, "A Personal Record," Mr. Conrad deplores a general tendency on the part of reviewers to neglect the exciting possibilities of their calling; instead of relating the true adventures of their souls at grips with an author, they cultivate "the agility of a trained pen running in a desert."

headline.main: MR. CONRAD'S NEW FIELD; Strikingly Original Theme in His Latest Novel, "Chance" -- Other Important Works of Current Fiction CHANCE. By Joseph Conrad. Doubleday, Page & Co. CURRENT FICTION CURRENT FICTION CURRENT FICTION CURRENT FICTION
